speaker: Mia
text: If I spoke better English, I would apply for that remote role in Canada.
ipa: ɪf aɪ spoʊk ˈbɛtɚ ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ | aɪ wʊd əˈplaɪ fɔɹ ðæt ɹɪˈmoʊt ɹoʊl ɪn ˈkænədə
stress: IF I SPOKE BETTER ENGLISH | I WOULD APPLY for THAT REMOTE ROLE in CANADA
linking:
"spoke better" → /spoʊk ˈbɛtɚ/ (k + b linking)
"apply for" → /əˈplaɪ fɔɹ/ (y + f linking)

speaker: Josh
text: You totally could! If I had your portfolio, I would be working for a US company already.
ipa: ju ˈtoʊtəli kʊd | ɪf aɪ hæd jɔɹ pɔɹtˈfoʊlioʊ | aɪ wʊd bi ˈwɝkɪŋ fɔɹ ə ju ɛs ˈkʌmpəni ɔlˈɹɛdi
stress: YOU TOTALLY COULD | IF I HAD YOUR PORTFOLIO | I WOULD BE WORKING for a US COMPANY ALREADY
linking:
"had your" → /hæd jɔɹ/ (d + y linking)
"working for" → /ˈwɝkɪŋ fɔɹ/ (ng + f linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Thanks. Honestly, if I practiced more speaking daily, I might feel more confident.
ipa: θæŋks | ˈɑnəstli | ɪf aɪ ˈpræktɪst mɔɹ ˈspiːkɪŋ ˈdeɪli | aɪ maɪt fil mɔɹ ˈkɑnfɪdənt
stress: THANKS | HONESTLY | IF I PRACTICED MORE SPEAKING DAILY | I MIGHT FEEL MORE CONFIDENT
linking:
"practiced more" → /ˈpræktɪst mɔɹ/ (d + m linking)
"feel more" → /fil mɔɹ/ (l + m linking)

speaker: Josh
text: If you wanted, we could set up weekly speaking sessions together. I’m working on my fluency too.
ipa: ɪf ju ˈwɑntɪd | wi kʊd sɛt ʌp ˈwikli ˈspiːkɪŋ ˈsɛʃənz təˈɡɛðɚ | aɪm ˈwɝkɪŋ ɑn maɪ ˈfluənsi tu
stress: IF YOU WANTED | WE COULD SET UP WEEKLY SPEAKING SESSIONS TOGETHER | I’M WORKING ON MY FLUENCY TOO
linking:
"set up" → /sɛt ʌp/ (t + u linking)
"speaking sessions" → /ˈspiːkɪŋ ˈsɛʃənz/ (ng + s linking)

speaker: Mia
text: That would be great. If I didn’t worry so much about sounding perfect, I would enjoy conversations more.
ipa: ðæt wʊd bi ɡɹeɪt | ɪf aɪ ˈdɪdənt ˈwɝi soʊ mʌʧ əˈbaʊt ˈsaʊndɪŋ ˈpɝfɪkt | aɪ wʊd ɛnˈʤɔɪ ˌkɑnvɚˈseɪʃənz mɔɹ
stress: THAT WOULD BE GREAT | IF I DIDN’T WORRY SO MUCH ABOUT SOUNDING PERFECT | I WOULD ENJOY CONVERSATIONS MORE
linking:
"didn't worry" → /ˈdɪdənt ˈwɝi/ (t + w linking)
"enjoy conversations" → /ɛnˈʤɔɪ ˌkɑnvɚˈseɪʃənz/ (y + c linking)

speaker: Josh
text: Totally relatable. If we just focused on expressing ideas, fluency would come with time.
ipa: ˈtoʊtəli ɹɪˈleɪtəbəl | ɪf wi ʤəst ˈfoʊkəst ɑn ɪkˈspɹɛsɪŋ aɪˈdiəz | ˈfluənsi wʊd kʌm wɪð taɪm
stress: TOTALLY RELATABLE | IF WE JUST FOCUSED ON EXPRESSING IDEAS | FLUENCY WOULD COME WITH TIME
linking:
"focused on" → /ˈfoʊkəst ɑn/ (t + o linking)
"come with" → /kʌm wɪð/ (m + w linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Also, if I took some time to organize my GitHub properly, I could attract better opportunities.
ipa: ˈɔlsoʊ | ɪf aɪ tʊk səm taɪm tə ˈɔɹɡəˌnaɪz maɪ ˈɡɪthʌb ˈpɹɑpɚli | aɪ kʊd əˈtɹækt ˈbɛtɚ ˌɑpɚˈtunɪtiz
stress: ALSO | IF I TOOK SOME TIME TO ORGANIZE MY GITHUB PROPERLY | I COULD ATTRACT BETTER OPPORTUNITIES
linking:
"took some" → /tʊk səm/ (k + s linking)
"attract better" → /əˈtɹækt ˈbɛtɚ/ (t + b linking)

speaker: Josh
text: Yup, and if you added more real-world projects, recruiters would notice fast.
ipa: jʌp | ənd ɪf ju ˈædɪd mɔɹ ˈɹiəl wɝld ˈpɹɑʤɛkts | ɹɪˈkɹutɚz wʊd ˈnoʊtɪs fæst
stress: YUP | AND IF YOU ADDED MORE REAL-WORLD PROJECTS | RECRUITERS WOULD NOTICE FAST
linking:
"added more" → /ˈædɪd mɔɹ/ (d + m linking)
"notice fast" → /ˈnoʊtɪs fæst/ (s + f linking)

speaker: Mia
text: You’re right. If I got serious about it this month, it could open doors next quarter.
ipa: jʊɹ ɹaɪt | ɪf aɪ ɡɑt ˈsɪɹiəs əˈbaʊt ɪt ðɪs mʌnθ | ɪt kʊd ˈoʊpən dɔɹz nɛkst ˈkwɔɹtɚ
stress: YOU’RE RIGHT | IF I GOT SERIOUS ABOUT IT THIS MONTH | IT COULD OPEN DOORS NEXT QUARTER
linking:
"got serious" → /ɡɑt ˈsɪɹiəs/ (t + s linking)
"open doors" → /ˈoʊpən dɔɹz/ (n + d linking)
